overview: Obtaining a citizenship certificate by descent is a multi-step process that involves your local ward office and the District Administration Office (DAO). This is the most common type of citizenship for Nepali nationals whose parents are citizens of Nepal.
overviewNepali: वंशजको आधारमा नागरिकता प्रमाणपत्र प्राप्त गर्नु एक बहु-चरण प्रक्रिया हो जसमा तपाईंको स्थानीय वडा कार्यालय र जिल्ला प्रशासन कार्यालय (जिप्रका) समावेश छ। यो नेपाली नागरिकहरूका लागि सबैभन्दा सामान्य प्रकारको नागरिकता हो जसका अभिभावकहरू नेपालका नागरिक हुन्।
stepByStepGuide: Gather all required documents: birth certificate, parents' citizenship copies, and passport photos
Visit your local ward office during working hours (Sunday-Friday, 10 AM onwards)
Request a recommendation letter (सिफारिस पत्र) for citizenship
Ward secretary will verify your documents and residence
Obtain the sealed recommendation letter - valid for 35 days
Visit the District Administration Office (DAO) of your permanent residence
Fill out Form 1 (नागरिकता फाराम नं. १) - available at DAO
Submit all documents at the citizenship section counter
Pay Rs. 10 government fee
Provide biometric data (fingerprints) and have photo taken
Receive acknowledgment receipt with collection date
Return on specified date (7-15 days) to collect your citizenship certificate
importantNotes: Applicant must be at least 16 years old
Both parents must be Nepali citizens for citizenship by descent
Father or guardian should accompany applicant to DAO for identity verification
Ward recommendation is valid for only 35 days - plan your DAO visit accordingly
Friday office hours are shorter (closes at 3 PM)
Bring original documents along with photocopies for verification
Government offices are closed on Saturdays and public holidays
Peak season (election periods, fiscal year end) may cause longer delays

faqs.question: What is the minimum age to apply for citizenship?
faqs.questionNepali: नागरिकताको लागि आवेदन दिन न्यूनतम उमेर कति हो?
faqs.answer: You must be at least 16 years old to apply for citizenship certificate in Nepal.
faqs.answerNepali: नेपालमा नागरिकता प्रमाणपत्रको लागि आवेदन दिन कम्तीमा १६ वर्ष उमेर पुगेको हुनुपर्छ।

faqs.question: What if my birth was not registered within 35 days?
faqs.questionNepali: मेरो जन्म ३५ दिनभित्र दर्ता नगरिएको खण्डमा के गर्ने?
faqs.answer: You'll need to obtain a late birth registration first. This requires supporting documents like school certificates, immunization cards, or witness statements. Visit your ward office with these documents.
faqs.answerNepali: तपाईंले पहिले ढिलो जन्म दर्ता गराउनु पर्नेछ। यसको लागि विद्यालयको प्रमाणपत्र, खोप कार्ड वा साक्षीको बयान जस्ता सहयोगी कागजातहरू आवश्यक छ। यी कागजातहरू लिएर आफ्नो वडा कार्यालयमा जानुहोस्।

faqs.question: Can I apply if only one parent is a Nepali citizen?
faqs.questionNepali: एक जना अभिभावक मात्र नेपाली नागरिक भएमा आवेदन दिन सकिन्छ?
faqs.answer: Yes, under the current law, if either your father or mother was a Nepali citizen at the time of your birth, you are eligible for citizenship by descent.
faqs.answerNepali: हो, हालको कानून अनुसार, तपाईंको जन्म हुँदाको समयमा बाबु वा आमा मध्ये कुनै एक नेपाली नागरिक भएमा, तपाईं वंशजको आधारमा नागरिकताको लागि योग्य हुनुहुन्छ।

faqs.question: How long is the citizenship certificate valid?
faqs.questionNepali: नागरिकता प्रमाणपत्र कति समयसम्म मान्य हुन्छ?
faqs.answer: The citizenship certificate is valid for lifetime and does not require renewal. However, if lost or damaged, you'll need to apply for a duplicate.
faqs.answerNepali: नागरिकता प्रमाणपत्र जीवनभर मान्य हुन्छ र नवीकरण आवश्यक पर्दैन। तर, हराएको वा बिग्रेको खण्डमा प्रतिलिपिको लागि आवेदन दिनुपर्छ।

faqs.question: Can I apply at any DAO or only my home district?
faqs.questionNepali: कुनै पनि जिप्रकामा आवेदन दिन सकिन्छ वा गृह जिल्लामा मात्र?
faqs.answer: You must apply at the DAO of your permanent residence district. Your ward recommendation must also be from your permanent residence ward.
faqs.answerNepali: तपाईंले आफ्नो स्थायी बसोबासको जिल्लाको जिप्रकामा आवेदन दिनुपर्छ। तपाईंको वडा सिफारिस पनि तपाईंको स्थायी बसोबासको वडाबाट हुनुपर्छ।

commonIssues.issue: Ward office refuses to provide recommendation
commonIssues.issueNepali: वडा कार्यालयले सिफारिस दिन अस्वीकार गरेको
commonIssues.solution: Ensure all documents are complete and correct. If refused without valid reason, ask for written explanation. You can file complaint with the ward chairperson or municipality office.
commonIssues.solutionNepali: सबै कागजातहरू पूर्ण र सही छन् भनी सुनिश्चित गर्नुहोस्। वैध कारण बिना अस्वीकार भएमा, लिखित स्पष्टीकरण माग्नुहोस्। तपाईं वडा अध्यक्ष वा नगरपालिका कार्यालयमा उजुरी दिन सक्नुहुन्छ।

commonIssues.solution: Visit the DAO with your acknowledgment receipt and politely inquire about the status. If there's no valid reason for delay, request to meet with the Section Officer or CDO.
commonIssues.solutionNepali: आफ्नो रसिद लिएर जिप्रकामा जानुहोस् र विनम्रतापूर्वक स्थितिबारे सोध्नुहोस्। ढिलाइको वैध कारण नभएमा, शाखा अधिकृत वा प्रजिअसँग भेट्न अनुरोध गर्नुहोस्।

commonIssues.issue: Name mismatch between birth certificate and parents' citizenship
commonIssues.issueNepali: जन्म प्रमाणपत्र र अभिभावकको नागरिकतामा नाम मेल नखाएको
commonIssues.solution: Obtain a relationship certificate (नाता प्रमाणित) from your ward office that verifies your relationship with your parents despite the name difference.
commonIssues.solutionNepali: नामको भिन्नता भए तापनि तपाईंको अभिभावकसँगको सम्बन्ध प्रमाणित गर्ने नाता प्रमाणित तपाईंको वडा कार्यालयबाट प्राप्त गर्नुहोस्।

commonIssues.issue: Parents' citizenship records not found in DAO system
commonIssues.issueNepali: अभिभावकको नागरिकता अभिलेख जिप्रका प्रणालीमा नभेटिएको
commonIssues.solution: Bring parents with their original citizenship certificates to the DAO. The records may need to be retrieved from archives or the original issuing DAO.
commonIssues.solutionNepali: अभिभावकहरूलाई तिनीहरूको मूल नागरिकता प्रमाणपत्र सहित जिप्रकामा ल्याउनुहोस्। अभिलेखहरू अभिलेखागार वा मूल जारी गर्ने जिप्रकाबाट पुन: प्राप्त गर्नुपर्ने हुन सक्छ।

overview: Birth registration is mandatory for every child born in Nepal. It should be done within 35 days of birth for free registration. Late registration incurs a small fee and may require additional documentation.
overviewNepali: नेपालमा जन्मेका हरेक बच्चाको लागि जन्म दर्ता अनिवार्य छ। निःशुल्क दर्ताको लागि जन्मको ३५ दिनभित्र गर्नुपर्छ। ढिलो दर्तामा सामान्य शुल्क लाग्छ र थप कागजात आवश्यक पर्न सक्छ।
stepByStepGuide: Collect birth documents from hospital (if hospital birth)
Gather parents' citizenship photocopies
Visit ward office of birth location or parents' residence
Fill out birth registration form
Submit documents and pay fee if applicable
Receive birth certificate immediately or within 1 day
importantNotes: Registration within 35 days is FREE
Late registration costs Rs. 100 and requires additional proof
Birth certificate is essential for school admission, citizenship, passport
Father or mother should be present for registration

faqs.question: Can I register my child's birth in a different ward than where the birth occurred?
faqs.questionNepali: जन्म भएको ठाउँभन्दा फरक वडामा बच्चाको जन्म दर्ता गर्न सकिन्छ?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can register at either the ward where birth occurred OR the ward of parents' permanent residence.
faqs.answerNepali: हो, तपाईं जन्म भएको वडा वा अभिभावकको स्थायी बसोबासको वडामा दर्ता गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

faqs.question: What if I don't have a hospital birth certificate?
faqs.questionNepali: अस्पताल जन्म प्रमाणपत्र नभएमा के गर्ने?
faqs.answer: For home births, you can provide a witness statement from the birth attendant or village health worker. Some wards accept immunization card as supporting evidence.
faqs.answerNepali: घरमा जन्मको लागि, तपाईं जन्म सहायक वा गाउँ स्वास्थ्य कार्यकर्ताबाट साक्षी बयान प्रदान गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ। केही वडाहरूले खोप कार्ड पनि सहयोगी प्रमाणको रूपमा स्वीकार गर्छन्।

commonIssues.solution: For registrations more than 1 year late, you may need court order or additional verification. Collect school certificates, immunization records, or affidavits from witnesses.
commonIssues.solutionNepali: १ वर्षभन्दा बढी ढिला दर्ताको लागि, तपाईंलाई अदालतको आदेश वा थप प्रमाणीकरण आवश्यक पर्न सक्छ। विद्यालयको प्रमाणपत्र, खोप अभिलेख वा साक्षीहरूबाट शपथपत्र सङ्कलन गर्नुहोस्।

overview: Nepal issues Machine Readable Passports (MRP) through the Department of Passport. The application process is now primarily online, with in-person verification at designated passport offices.
overviewNepali: नेपालले राहदानी विभाग मार्फत मेशिन रिडेबल पासपोर्ट (एमआरपी) जारी गर्दछ। आवेदन प्रक्रिया अब मुख्यतया अनलाइन छ, तोकिएका राहदानी कार्यालयहरूमा व्यक्तिगत प्रमाणीकरण सहित।
stepByStepGuide: Visit nepalpassport.gov.np and create an account
Fill the online application form with accurate details
Upload a recent passport-size photo (specifications provided on site)
Select preferred passport office and appointment date
Pay fee online via eSewa, Khalti, or bank transfer
Print application form and payment receipt
Visit passport office on appointment date with all documents
Complete biometric enrollment (photo and fingerprints)
Wait for processing (15-30 days regular, 2-5 days express)
Collect passport from the same office
importantNotes: Online application is MANDATORY - walk-in not accepted
Regular passport (34 pages): NPR 5,000 | 66 pages: NPR 7,000
Express service adds NPR 10,000 to regular fee
Passport valid for 10 years (adults) or 5 years (minors under 16)
Arrive 30 minutes before appointment time
Minors must be accompanied by both parents or legal guardian

faqs.question: How do I get an appointment if all slots are booked?
faqs.questionNepali: सबै स्लट बुक भएमा भेटघाट कसरी पाउने?
faqs.answer: New slots are released periodically. Check the website early morning (6-8 AM) for better availability. Slots for district offices often have more availability than Kathmandu.
faqs.answerNepali: नयाँ स्लटहरू समय-समयमा जारी गरिन्छ। राम्रो उपलब्धताको लागि बिहान ६-८ बजे वेबसाइट जाँच गर्नुहोस्। जिल्ला कार्यालयहरूको स्लटहरू प्रायः काठमाडौंभन्दा बढी उपलब्ध हुन्छन्।

faqs.question: Can minors apply for passport?
faqs.questionNepali: नाबालिगहरूले राहदानीको लागि आवेदन दिन सक्छन्?
faqs.answer: Yes, minors can get passport with consent from both parents (or legal guardian). Both parents must be present at the passport office with their citizenship certificates.
faqs.answerNepali: हो, नाबालिगहरूले दुवै अभिभावक (वा कानूनी संरक्षक) को सहमतिमा राहदानी प्राप्त गर्न सक्छन्। दुवै अभिभावक आफ्नो नागरिकता प्रमाणपत्र सहित राहदानी कार्यालयमा उपस्थित हुनुपर्छ।

commonIssues.solution: Ensure photo meets specifications: white background, recent (within 6 months), face centered, no glasses, proper lighting. Use the photo cropping tool on the website.
commonIssues.solutionNepali: फोटोले विशिष्टताहरू पूरा गरेको सुनिश्चित गर्नुहोस्: सेतो पृष्ठभूमि, हालको (६ महिनाभित्रको), अनुहार केन्द्रमा, चश्मा नभएको, उचित प्रकाश। वेबसाइटमा फोटो क्रप गर्ने उपकरण प्रयोग गर्नुहोस्।

commonIssues.issueNepali: भुक्तानी असफल भयो तर रकम कट्यो
commonIssues.solution: Wait 24-48 hours for automatic reversal. If not refunded, contact your payment provider (eSewa/Khalti) or the passport helpline with transaction details.
commonIssues.solutionNepali: स्वचालित फिर्ताको लागि २४-४८ घण्टा पर्खनुहोस्। फिर्ता नभएमा, लेनदेन विवरणहरू सहित आफ्नो भुक्तानी प्रदायक (eSewa/Khalti) वा राहदानी हेल्पलाइनमा सम्पर्क गर्नुहोस्।

overview: If your citizenship certificate is lost, stolen, or damaged beyond recognition, you can apply for a duplicate certificate. This requires a police report, newspaper publication, and verification at the DAO.
overviewNepali: तपाईंको नागरिकता प्रमाणपत्र हराएको, चोरी भएको वा चिन्न नसकिने गरी बिग्रेको खण्डमा, तपाईंले प्रतिलिपि प्रमाणपत्रको लागि आवेदन दिन सक्नुहुन्छ। यसको लागि प्रहरी प्रतिवेदन, समाचारपत्र प्रकाशन र जिप्रकामा प्रमाणीकरण आवश्यक छ।
stepByStepGuide: File FIR at the nearest police station for lost/stolen citizenship
Get a copy of the police report
Publish a notice in a national daily newspaper declaring the loss
Visit ward office for recommendation letter with police report and newspaper
Go to the DAO where original citizenship was issued (or current residence)
Fill duplicate citizenship application form
Submit all documents and pay Rs. 400 fee
Complete biometric enrollment
Wait for verification (7-21 days)
Collect duplicate certificate
importantNotes: Duplicate fee is Rs. 400 (vs Rs. 10 for first-time)
Process takes longer as original records need verification
If DAO doesn't have digital records, they may contact original issuing DAO
Keep duplicate application receipt safely
Old citizenship number is retained in most cases

faqs.question: Do I need to apply at my original DAO?
faqs.answer: It's recommended but not mandatory. You can apply at your current residence DAO, but they will need to verify records with the original issuing DAO, which may take longer.
faqs.answerNepali: सिफारिस गरिएको छ तर अनिवार्य छैन। तपाईं हालको बसोबासको जिप्रकामा आवेदन दिन सक्नुहुन्छ, तर तिनीहरूले मूल जारी गर्ने जिप्रकासँग अभिलेख प्रमाणीकरण गर्नुपर्नेछ, जसले बढी समय लिन सक्छ।

commonIssues.solution: This can happen for older citizenships. Bring any supporting documents: old photos with citizenship, voter ID, passport, or relatives who can verify your identity.
commonIssues.solutionNepali: पुरानो नागरिकताहरूमा यो हुन सक्छ। कुनै पनि सहयोगी कागजातहरू ल्याउनुहोस्: नागरिकता सहितको पुरानो फोटो, मतदाता परिचयपत्र, राहदानी, वा तपाईंको पहिचान प्रमाणित गर्न सक्ने आफन्तहरू।
